mapper.select: SELECT tfa.loginID, tfa.fair_no AS id, tfa.fair_title AS title, ifnull(tfa.fair_content, '-') AS content, ifnull(tfa.fair_startdate, '-') AS startDate, ifnull(tfa.fair_enddate, '-') AS endDate, ifnull(tfa.fair_address1, '-') AS address1, ifnull(tfa.fair_address2, '-') AS address2, ifnull(tfa.fair_zipcode, '-') AS zipcode, ifnull(tfa.fair_name, '-') AS name, ifnull(tfa.fair_location, '-') AS location, ifnull(tfa.fair_companyNum, '-') AS companyNum, ifnull(ui.user_phone, '-') AS phone, ifnull(ui.user_email, '-') AS email, ifnull(tfj.join_boothnum, '0') AS boothNum, tfj.is_delete AS isDelete, ifnull(tfj.join_memo, '-') AS memo, tfa.file_cd AS fileCd, tfi.file_name, tfi.file_size, tfi.file_nadd, tfi.file_madd FROM tb_fair tfa LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON tfa.loginID = ui.loginID LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_file tfi ON tfa.file_cd = tfi.file_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_fair_join tfj ON tfa.fair_no = tfj.fair_no WHERE tfa.fair_no = #{id} AND tfj.loginID = #{loginId};

SELECT detail_code AS locationCd, detail_name AS location
FROM tb_detail_code WHERE group_code = "location";
